caption.title: Influence of rhein on the histopathological changes.
caption.p:
Mice were treated as mentioned in
Fig 6 . At day 6 p.i., six mice from each group were sacrificed. The right lungs were used for H&E staining assay. (A) Blank control (BC), (B) Negative control (NC), (C) Positive control (PC), (D and E) Rhein-treated groups (Rhe75 and Rhe150, respectively). (→) alveolar wall, (▼) inflammatory exudation, (▽) hemorrhage (erythrocytes). The original magnification was 200×.
